name: Five Nights at freddy's 1 Location
description:
its a full remake of the fnaf 1 location with

parts and service, office, secret springtrap hiding spot, stage, toilets

this is just the map without animatronics

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS----------------------

when opening the game. windows will tell you its a dangerous file i dont know how to fix this but just press on "more info" and "start anyway" have fun!
